skill.s1.name: Chill Break
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]72.1% DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, with a [color=#00adff][b]100%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict the main target with [color=#00adff][b][i]Freeze[/i][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s2.name: Frost Slash
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]92.9% DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to random enemies 5 times, prioritizing enemies that have not been attacked yet.
When Fox has Shield, additionally increases skill damage by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color].
Decreases skill damage by 60% when attacking the same enemy, up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]20%[/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Ginka-Zanshin
skill.s3.description: Upgrades Fox's next [color=#c16d92][b][Dragon Dance][/b][/color] to [color=#7baedd][b][Dragon Roar][/b][/color].
Increase the chance to trigger Counter to [color=#00adff][b]100%[/b][/color], increase skill multiplier by [color=#00adff][b]58.6% DEF[/b][/color] and turn it into an AoE attack.
Automatically triggers [color=#7baedd][b][Dragon Roar][/b][/color] if Fox didn't trigger it for 1 turn.
Turns Fox's weakness into neutral, gains immunity to Mental Ailments and Taunt all enemies for 2 turns.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]178.1% DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, and increases the chance to trigger [color=#c16d92][b][Dragon Dance][/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]35%[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
skill.p1.name: Creation
skill.p1.description: When gaining [color=#00adff][b]Shield[/b][/color], increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]7.5%[/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 6 stacks.
skill.p2.name: Craving
skill.p2.description: When using skills that give [color=#00adff][b]Shield[/b][/color], increases Fox's [color=#00adff][b]PEN[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]20.0%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
awareness.a0.name: Dragon Dance
awareness.a0.description: When taking skill damage, there is a [color=#00adff][b]65%[/b][/color] fixed chance to trigger [color=#c16d92][b][Dragon Dance][/b][/color]: a Counter that deals [color=#00adff][b]66% DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to the enemy as a Follow Up Attack.
Fox can upgrade this effect to [color=#7baedd][b][Dragon Roar][/b][/color] with skills.
awareness.a1.name: Streamline Engraving
awareness.a1.description: After using [ref=s3][color=#665d9d][b][u][Ginka-Zashin][/u][/b][/color][/ref] 2 times, additionally gain 1 [color=#7baedd][b][Dragon Roar][/b][/color], this Counter will deals [color=#00adff][b]70%[/b][/color] damage.
awareness.a2.name: Palette Harmony
awareness.a2.description: [ref=hl][color=#665d9d][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Ink Splash
awareness.a3.description: When Fox's [color=#00adff][b]HP[/b][/color] is not below [color=#00adff][b]35%[/b][/color], increase Follow Up [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]70%[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: Intersection of Light and Shadow
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s1][color=#665d9d][b][u][Chill Break][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s2][color=#665d9d][b][u][Frost Slash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Superior Insights
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#665d9d][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Increase Counter [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
awareness.a6.name: Vibrant Brushstrokes
awareness.a6.description: Evolves [color=#c16d92][b][Dragon Dance][/b][/color] and [color=#7baedd][b][Dragon Roar][/b][/color] into [color=#a02159][b][Crazed Dragon Dance][/b][/color] and [color=#2ecade][b][Crazed Dragon Roar][/b][/color].
Fox's Counter now deal 2 hits of damage, each hit dealing [color=#00adff][b]70%[/b][/color] of the original damage and gain [color=#00adff][b]30% PEN[/b][/color] when triggering Counter.
